albums.title: The Dark Side of the Moon
albums.cover: ./assets/albumart/pink floyd - the dark side of the moon.jpg
albums.description:
I struggle to put into words how unique and truly special this album is. I’d seen the album cover around my whole life, but the first time I actually listened to it was in 2020 when I found a copy of it on cassette at a thrift store. I listened to that tape dozens of times before I finally found it on CD.

This album of grandiose, interconnected songs explore themes related to human existence such as life, death, time, money and mental illness through a uniquely cryptic and philosophical lens. As each song fades into the next, the listener is left with these enigmatic messages which, over time, becomes interpreted into their own profound meanings. It speaks to us differently each time we listen to these songs as we grow and experience more of what life has to offer.

I’ve listened to it countless times and there’s nothing like it. I have so many memories listening to it. I’m a huge fan of The Dark Side of The Moon.
